meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Maren Beazer Greg Chin Pat Greiner Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7506.

td.p: Maren Beazer, a homemaker from Erda, Utah
Greg Chin, a direct service provider from New York, New York
Pat Greiner, a radio copywriter and voiceover announcer from Casper, Wyoming (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,800)

tr.td: ANIMATED CHARACTERS
CAVES
HAPPY ANNIVERSARY!
ANIMAL LIT FILL-IN
EQUAL
SIGN
